RapidAuth.description: If you don't currently have an API key, you can visit https://resettle.ai/dev to acquire a free one
RapidAuth.name: X-RapidAPI-Key

get.description: Retrieve universities details by ranking type and rank

name.description: The commonly used name of the university

aliases.description: Aliases of the university, different rankings might provide their own slightly modified version

domain.description: The main website of the university

rank.description: The rank value if the rank type is exact, the lower limit if the rank type is either close ranged or open ranged

rank2.description: If the rank type is close ranged, this property is defined and will be the upper limit of the rank

type.description: The type of the ranking, can be exact (still possible to have multiple universities with the same rank value), close ranged (e.g. rank 101-150 means the university is ranked between 101-150 inclusive), or open-ranged (e.g. rank 1001+ means the university is ranked after 1001 inclusive)

rank.description: The rank of the university
The rank value if the rank type is exact, the lower limit if the rank type is either close ranged or open ranged

rank2.description: If the rank type is close ranged, this property is defined and will be the upper limit of the rank

type.description: The type of the ranking, can be exact (still possible to have multiple universities with the same rank value), close ranged (e.g. rank 101-150 means the university is ranked between 101-150 inclusive), or open-ranged (e.g. rank 1001+ means the university is ranked after 1001 inclusive)

rank2.description: If the rank type is close ranged, this property is defined and will be the upper limit of the rank

type.description: The type of the ranking, can be exact (still possible to have multiple universities with the same rank value), close ranged (e.g. rank 101-150 means the university is ranked between 101-150 inclusive), or open-ranged (e.g. rank 1001+ means the university is ranked after 1001 inclusive)

rank.description: The rank of the score

name.description: The commonly used name of the university

aliases.description: Aliases of the university, different rankings might provide their own slightly modified version

domain.description: The main website of the university

search.summary: Search for university with name MIT

parameters.name: fuzzy
parameters.description: Whether to perform a fuzzy match or exact text match

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the place

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The max items to retrieve, default to 100
